thread.title: Big Fish Report: Speckled trout fishing is picking up
thread.title_full: Big Fish Report: Speckled trout fishing is picking up - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Big Fish Report: Speckled trout fishing is picking up
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - Even in windy conditions, Shell Beach is undoubtedly the place to be this weekend while fall speckled trout fishing is picking up.
A good mixed box of fish is a lay-up just about anywhere you stop. Capt. Jacques labreouer, Robbie Campo and I headed south of Shell Beach to fish the marshes around Lake Robin.
What we found was nearly a different fish every cast. Great variety and fun, not to mention the tasty choices we took home. What do you need? A rod, a reel, a few live shrimp and a popping cork.
Signs of fall fishing in Shell Beach getting better and better if you come out here, and the speckled trout will turn on any day now. Fantastic fishing!
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
